nodes.text: Ithull was the gigantic homeworld of the Ithullans and the colossus wasps. The Ithullans were almost wiped out by the Mandalorians in the year 200 BBY.

The description of Ithull as "immense" in the Tales of the Jedi Companion, and the capacity of the colussus wasp to withstand intense pressures strongly suggests, but does not confirm, that the world was a gas giant.
